SEARCH
Package Network.RMI

Interface Server_RMI

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Server
public interface Server_RMI extends Remote
The Server_RMI interface defines the contract for the RMI server. It allows clients to interact with the server using remote method invocation.

  • Method Details

    • createLobby

      int createLobby(int numPlayers, String creatorLobby, ClientCallback client) throws RemoteException
      Creates a lobby with the specified number of players and creator's name.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players in the lobby
      creatorLobby - the name of the lobby creator
      client - the client callback object
      Returns:
      the reference ID of the created lobby
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • joinLobby

      int joinLobby() throws RemoteException
      Joins an existing lobby.
      Returns:
      the reference ID of the joined lobby
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • addPlayer

      int addPlayer(int index, String name, ClientCallback Client) throws RemoteException
      Adds a player to the specified lobby.
      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      name - the name of the player
      Client - the client callback object
      Returns:
      the ID of the added player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • nameAleradyTaken

      boolean nameAleradyTaken(int index, String name, int id) throws RemoteException
      Checks if a name is already taken in the specified lobby.
      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      name - the name to check
      id - the ID of the player
      Returns:
      true if the name is already taken, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • changeName

      void changeName(int index, int id, String name) throws RemoteException
      Changes the name of a player in the specified lobby.
      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      id - the ID of the player
      name - the new name for the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      id_receiver - the ID of the message receiver
      Returns:
      the list of game chat messages
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      possibleChatmex - the list of chat messages to append
      myname - the name of the sender
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

      Retrieves the dashboard of the specified lobby.
      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      Returns:
      the dashboard as a 2D array of tiles
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

      playerName - the name of the player
      playerId - the ID of the player

      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • pickableTiles

      boolean pickableTiles(int index, List<Integer> xCoord, List<Integer> yCoord) throws RemoteException
      Checks if the specified tiles are pickable in the specified lobby.
      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      xCoord - the list of x coordinates of the tiles
      yCoord - the list of y coordinates of the tiles
      Returns:
      true if the tiles are pickable, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • getSelectedTiles

      Tile[] getSelectedTiles(int index, int tilesToPick, List<Integer> xCoord, List<Integer> yCoord) throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the selected tiles in the specified lobby based on the number of tiles to pick and their coordinates.
      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      tilesToPick - the number of tiles to pick
      xCoord - the list of x coordinates of the tiles
      yCoord - the list of y coordinates of the tiles
      Returns:
      the array of selected tiles
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • columnAvailable

      boolean columnAvailable(int index, int numTiles, Shelf myShelf, int selectedCol) throws RemoteException
      Checks if a column is available to insert tiles in the specified lobby.
      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      numTiles - the number of tiles to insert
      myShelf - the shelf of the player
      selectedCol - the selected column
      Returns:
      true if the column is available, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • finalPick

      void finalPick(int index, List<Integer> xCord, List<Integer> yCord) throws RemoteException
      Performs the final pick of tiles in the specified lobby based on their coordinates.
      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      xCord - the list of x coordinates of the tiles
      yCord - the list of y coordinates of the tiles
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • insertTiles

      void insertTiles(int LobbyReference, List<Integer> xCoord, List<Integer> yCoord, int column) throws RemoteException
      Inserts tiles into a column in the specified lobby based on their coordinates.
      Parameters:
      LobbyReference - the reference ID of the lobby
      xCoord - the list of x coordinates of the tiles
      yCoord - the list of y coordinates of the tiles
      column - the column to insert the tiles into
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • checkWinner

      String checkWinner(int index, int id) throws RemoteException
      Checks the winner of the game in the specified lobby based on the player ID.
      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      id - the ID of the player
      Returns:
      the winner's name, "DRAW" for a tie, or "NOT FINISHED" if the game is not finished
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • getCurrentPlayer

      int getCurrentPlayer(int index) throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the ID of the current player in the specified lobby.
      Parameters:
      index - the reference ID of the lobby
      Returns:
      the ID of the current player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

      Returns:

      Throws:
